description.para1: I’m Roshan Shrestha, a Full Stack Developer passionate about building practical and impactful web applications like Study Buddy. 💻✨
description.para2: With 4 years of experience in web development and design, I focus on AI-integrated applications 🤖, coding 💻, and mentoring future tech talent 🚀.
description.para3: Currently, I’m exploring AI-integrated applications and deepening my expertise in Python 🐍, crafting intuitive and high-impact web solutions 💡.
description.para4: Beyond technology, I enjoy playing guitar 🎸, gaming 🎮, and spending quality time with my dogs 🐶.

webproject.desc: Book doctors easily, manage appointments, and access healthcare at your fingertips. I’ve built MediBook with React, Node, and MongoDB – and I’d love your feedback & contributions to make it even better! 💡✨
